mapper.insert: insert into members(id, name, password, salary, hiredate, gender, hobby, job, zipcode, address1, address2, mpoint) values(#{id}, #{name}, #{password}, #{salary}, to_date(#{hiredate}, 'yyyy/MM/dd'), #{gender}, #{hobby}, #{job}, #{zipcode}, #{address1}, #{address2},#{mpoint})
mapper.update: update members set name = #{name}, password = #{password}, salary = #{salary}, hiredate = #{hiredate}, gender = #{gender}, hobby = #{hobby}, job = #{job}, zipcode = #{zipcode}, address1 = #{address1}, address2 = #{address2}, mpoint = #{mpoint} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, name, password, salary, hiredate, gender, hobby, job, zipcode, address1, address2, mpoint from members
select count(*) as cnt from members
select * from checkes where module = #{module} and field = #{field} and kind = #{kind} order by mykey asc
mapper.update: update boards set remark = #{remark} where writer = #{writer}
update orders set remark = #{remark} where mid = #{mid}
mapper.insert: insert into shoppinginfos(mid, pnum, pname, qty, price, image, point) values(#{mid}, #{pnum}, #{pname}, #{qty}, #{price}, #{image}, #{point})
